Product Description
Bertolli Vegetable Voor OpBrood Met Milde Olijfolie (Bread Spread with Mild Olive Oil) now features a new formula. It is
rich in monounsaturated fatty acids and is suitable for cooking and baking. The product is suitable for vegetarians and
retails in a 250g tub with a new look.

Ingredients:
Waters, Vegetable Fats and Oils (Vegetable Based) (Olive Oil (Refined)), Modified Starches
(Modified), Salt, emulsifiers (Mono-and Di-glycerides of Fatty Acids, Lecithin), Whey, Potassium
Sorbate (Preservatives), Citric Acid (Food Acids), Flavouring Substances, Beta-carotene (Food
Colours), Vitamins (Vitamin A, Vitamin D, Vitamin E)
Nutrition:
Per 10g serving: Energy 150kJ/35kcal, Protein <0.1g, Carbohydrate <0.5g (of which Sugars <0.1g),
Fat 3.8g (of which Saturated Fat 0.9g, Monounsaturated fat 2.1g, Polyunsaturated fat 1g, Trans Fat
<0.01g), Fibres <0.1g, Sodium 0.1g, Vitamin A 80µg (10% ADH), Vitamin D 0.8µg (15% ADH),
Vitamin E 1.8mg (18% ADH)
